articles.description: Pramod Bhagat has won his gold medal match, giving India a first ever badminton gold at the Paralympics.
articles.content: India’s Pramod Bhagat won the Men’s Singles SL3 event badminton gold medal match against Great Britain’s Daniell Bethell at the Tokyo Paralympics on Saturday. This is India’s first medal in badminton… [+2646 chars]
